full_summary:
# Solicitation Notice for the Supply of Enclosed Trailers

**Reference Number:** cb-5716-53963228
**Solicitation Number:** W8476-236660/B
**Publication Date:** 2023-05-19
**Closing Date:** 2023-06-07T14:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Materiel:** Product and material trailers (`25181700` according to UNSPSC)

## Notice Overview
The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the supply of enclosed cargo trailers (`25181700` according to UNSPSC) and related items (`*25181700 – Remorques pour marchandises et matériaux`) in accordance with Supply Arrangement E60HP-19TRLR for Configuration 7.

- **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement
- **Procurement Category:** Government Defence (`GD`)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Trade Agreements:** WTO GPA and CFTA
- **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide (`Monde`)
- **Regions of Delivery:** Canada (`Canada`)

The contract requirement can be fulfilled by suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR. For more information on how to become a pre-qualified supplier, refer to the following webpage: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-923-76996.

## Tender Description
This solicitation supersedes the previous bid solicitation numbered W8476-236660/A dated 2022-11-18. The requested delivery date is on or before 120 days after the contract award. There is no security requirement associated with this requirement.

**Notice**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of National Defence Canada
101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Victor Shepstone, Contracting Authority
101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
Phone: (819) 939-3040
Email: [victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca](mailto:victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca)

 Note: I skipped certain minor details that were not very relevant. I hope you are satisfied with this rewritten text
